original_text: And they gave forth their lots; and the lot fell upon Matthias; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.
korean_text: 제비 뽑아 맛디아를 얻으니 그가 열한 사도의 수에 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: And they gave forth their lots
and the lot fell upon Matthias
and he was numbered with the eleven apostles
